name: optionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
as something that you choose to do, buy, etc., because you want to and not because you must: You can optionally add fruit, nuts, or other toppings to your sundae. The car comes with leather seats as standard, though you can optionally add heated seats for an extra charge.
More examplesFewer examplesArt and music courses are offered optionally for students who want extra humanities credits. You can optionally click and drag your tasks to display them in any order you want. Optionally, you could serve this dish as a simple lunch or dinner with vegetables.
